high_descs: go to the black shelf next to the book shelf
pick up the pencil from the stand
go to the left of the stand
put the pencil on the left open shelf of the stand
anns.task_desc: move the pencil from the top of the stand to the shelf on the left of the stand

high_descs: Turn left, turn left at the desk, walk to the small shelf.
Pick up the pen to the left of the white mug.
Move further back from the shelf.
Put the pen down on the second shelf to the left of the tissues.
anns.task_desc: To move a pen from the top shelf to the second shelf.

high_descs: Turn left then head to the drawer beside the book shefl
Pick up the pen on the drawer
Turn to your left and make a space, look down the drawer
Put the pencil in the second layer of the drawer
anns.task_desc: Put the pencil in the second layer of the drawer
